== Chockli (CT) (627291) ==

Chockli (CT) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 14.24 sq. km. and harbouring 7052 households with total population of 33732 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 32 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 482 km. Male population is 15055 and female population is 18677. Scheduled Caste population is 678 and Scheduled Tribes population is 112. Census Location Code of the town is 627291<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 95 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 66 km. Railway station is at Mahe at a distance of 2 km.
